alert.note: Alert for Bee (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 5:25PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Goliad, northwestern Refugio and eastern Bee Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 524 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Blanconia, or near Refugio, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, pea size hail and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Refugio and Blanconia. This includes the following highways... US Highway 183 between mile markers 652 and 668. US Highway 77 between mile markers 604 and 626. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
